titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 925) to extend the authorization of appropriations for allocation to carry out approved wetlands conservation projects under the North American Wetlands Conservation Act through fiscal year 2024.

Providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 925) to extend the authorization of appropriations for allocation to carry out approved wetlands conservation projects under the North American Wetlands Conservation Act through fiscal year 2024.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-556, by Mr. McGovern.
Providing for the consideration of the Senate amendments to H.R. 925.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 95.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1161.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 185 (Roll no. 212).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 188 (Roll no. 213).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 925) to extend the authorization of appropriations for allocation to carry out approved wetlands conservation projects under the North American Wetlands Conservation Act through fiscal year 2024.
